title: Advertisement, "Ad for The Composing Room, Inc.: "I Want a Thin Gothic"", 1901–50
signed: Signature printed at upper left: lustig.
inscribed: Printed in black ink, center: “I want a thin Gothic…”; lower left: While some of our customers specify type in this way, / most of them are meticulous about designating / face, size, foundry and pedigree. / We’re fond of both kinds. / As conscientious fellows we’ll track down / the type of your desire with only the vaguest description / of its peculiarities. Our people are trained for just / this kind of sleuthing, so call us when you have a type problem, / or even when you haven’t. / A REQUEST ON YOUR LETTERHEAD WILL BRING YOU OUR NEWS GOTHIC SPECIMEN FOLDER; lower right: THE COMPOSING ROOM, INC. / 130 West 46th Street, New York 36, New York / Judson 2-0100.
description: Center, two horizontal black lines run across page; lower center: one vertical black line; upper center: jumble of various printed letters.

tombstone.epitaph:
Advertisement, "Ad for The Composing Room, Inc.: "I Want a Thin Gothic"", 1901–50.
1901–50. Thin glossy paper. Gift of Susan Lustig Peck. 2001-29-62.
